title.rendered: Amazon Profit Analytics with Hai Mag of Eva Guru

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 30:27 — 27.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 30:27 — 27.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Hai Mag, the CEO and cofounder of Eva “intelligent profit maximization platform for Amazon sellers”  including both resellers and PL sellers will talk about Amazon Profit Analytics and what to look for in your KPI’s.

 

Get a 15 day free trial here.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • Why it is important to have clear P & L analytics
  • How they do taxes in Europe
  • What KPI’s to track
  • How to find the cost per product and why it’s important
  • The advertising cost for a product launch
  •  The launch phase objective and product/market fit
  • How to scale your business when there is continuous growth
  • To sustain sales and reduce cost
  • Why using a software trumps using a spreadsheet for tracking
